Title: ImageMol HIV growth inhibition
Description: TThis model has been developed using ImageMol, a deep learning model pretrained on 10 million unlabelled small molecules and fine-tuned in a second step to predict the inhibition of the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV). The HIV dataset is from MoleculeNet and contains 43850 small molecules and their in vitro activity against HIV (CA - Confirmed active, CM - Confirmed moderately active, CI - Confirmed inactive). The classification was based on EC50 values and expert knowledge.
Interpretation: Probability of HIV inhibition. Active compounds are considered those classified as CA/CM.
